Sentence.sentence: Most Grand Tourists, however, stayed for briefer periods and set out with less scholarly intentions, accompanied by a teacher or guardian, and expected to return home with souvenirs of their travels as well as an understanding of art and architecture formed by exposure to great masterpieces.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By raising relative demand for clean energy sources, a carbon price would also help align the market return to clean-energy innovation with its social return, spurring the refinement of existing technologies and the development of new ones.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Within just the past five years, I have noticed parents returning to a belief that teenagers need the guidance of elders rather than the liberal, anything goes mode of child-rearing that became popular in the second half of the 20th century.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We need more funding and more effort to return these languages to everyday use, says Fred Nowuski of the National Museum of the American Indian, We are making progress but money needs to be spent on revitalising languages, not just documenting them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As U.S.banks recovered with the help of the American government and the American taxpayer, president Obama held meetings with top bank executives, telling them it’s time to return the favor.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What a waste of money! In return for an average of ~44,000 of debt, students get an average of only 14 hours of lecture and tutorial time a week in Britain.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In  a  study  published  last  year,  psychologists  coined  the  term  workplace  telepressure  to  describe  an  employee's urge to immediately respond to emails and engage in obsessive thoughts about returning an email  to one's boss, colleagues or clients.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A  full  18  percent  have  even  returned  devices until they feel they can get safer guarantees against having their sensitive information hacked.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When they returned home, their droppings end up all around their nesting sites, including in nearby ponds.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Investors will invest in a bond considered risky only if the potential return is high enough.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He is far less likely to take a year of parental leave and then return on a reduced work schedule for the next eight years
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Even if the question is ostensibly (表面上) about something outside the self (describe a fictional character or solve a problem of geopolitics), the essay invariably returns to the favorite topic: what is its impact on YOU?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He was happy to see the return of the do-it-yourself spirit in America.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The more one saves, the more returns one will reap.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In return for the scale of investment, they should share their expertise in order to build greater confidence in the sector.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Inevitably however, the day came when she was so weakened that she had to return to Pittsburgh, her home town.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Anyway, you are one of the few people who actually return books to me.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She never expected anyone to return the books to her
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Most borrowers never returned the books to her.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Then it is returned to the box.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The man will return home before going to the concert.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And when we get off the plane, instead of being depleted, we feel recovered and ready to return to the performance zone.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In return for an average of £44,000 of debt, students get an average of only 14 hours of lecture and tutorial time a week in Britain.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Most Grand Tourists, however, stayed for briefer periods and set out with less scholarly intentions, accompanied by a teacher or guardian, and expected to return home with souvenirs of their travels as well as an understanding of art and architecture form
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The team plans to return to around a dozen of the buildings to assess progress and consider further action.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Thus the more imbalanced we become due to overworking, the more value there is in activities that allow us to return to a state of balance.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"回答"之意。
means: answer ：常用词，指用书面、口头或行动对他人的请求、询问、质问等作出回答或反应。
reply ：较正式用词，较少用于口语。侧重经过考虑的较正式答复。
respond ：正式用词，指即刻的，以口头或行动对外来的号召、请求或刺激等作出回答或响应。
retort ：指对不同意见、批评或控诉作出迅速、有力的回答，即"反驳"。
return ：正式用词，从本义"归来，回去"引申作"回答、答辨"讲时，含反驳或反唇相讥之意。

Sentence.sentence: Amy, as well as her brothers, was given a warm welcome when returning to the village last week.

Sentence.sentence: Axani wrote in his post that he is not looking for anything in return and that the woman who uses the looking for ticket can choose to either travel with him or take the ticket and travel on her own.

Sentence.sentence: But in order to stay in business, arts groups must produce returns.

Sentence.sentence: Investing time in parenting would bring a financial return.

Sentence.sentence: It's nice to return to learn what she loves.

Sentence.sentence: Luck stayed with them: Paris' heartbeat returned.

Sentence.sentence: Maurice Ashley was kind and smart, a former graduate returning to teach, and this job was no game for him: he meant business.

Sentence.sentence: My mother's call returned me to the real world.

Sentence.sentence: Nasa is worried about two things: recovery time once astronauts return home, and, more importantly, how to maintain strength and fitness for the two and a half years or more that it would take to make a round-trip to mars.

entry.def: When you return to a place, you go back there after you have been away.

example.ex: Blair will return to London tonight...
example.tran: 今晚布莱尔将返回伦敦。

example.ex: Our correspondent Stephen Sackur has just returned from the camps on the border...
example.tran: 我们的通讯记者斯蒂芬·萨克刚从边境的营地回来。

entry.def: Your return is your arrival back at a place where you had been before.

example.ex: Ryle explained the reason for his sudden return to London.
example.tran: 赖尔解释了他突然返回伦敦的原因。

entry.def: If you return something that you have borrowed or taken, you give it back or put it back.

example.ex: I enjoyed the book and said so when I returned it...
example.tran: 我喜欢这本书，并且在还书时也这样说了。

example.ex: The car was not returned on time, then was reported stolen.
example.tran: 这辆车没有按时归还，然后就报失了。

entry.def: If you return something somewhere, you put it back where it was.

example.ex: He returned the notebook to his jacket.
example.tran: 他把笔记本放回到他的夹克里。

entry.def: If you return someone's action, you do the same thing to them as they have just done to you. If you return someone's feeling, you feel the same way towards them as they feel towards you.

example.ex: Back at the station the Chief Inspector returned the call...
example.tran: 探长回到警察局后回了电话。

example.ex: She will be disappointed if her feelings are not returned.
example.tran: 如果她的感情得不到回报，她会感到非常失望。

entry.def: If a feeling or situation returns, it comes back or happens again after a period when it was not present.

example.ex: Official reports in Algeria suggest that calm is returning to the country...
example.tran: 阿尔及利亚的官方报告表明这个国家正在恢复往日的平静。

example.ex: The pain returned in waves.
example.tran: 疼痛又如潮水般阵阵袭来。

entry.def: If you return to a state that you were in before, you start being in that state again.

example.ex: Life has improved and returned to normal.
example.tran: 生活已经改善并恢复了正常。

entry.def: If you return to a subject that you have mentioned before, you begin talking about it again.

example.ex: The power of the Church is one theme all these writers return to.
example.tran: 所有这些作家都回归到了教会权力这个主题上。

entry.def: If you return to an activity that you were doing before, you start doing it again.
entry.tran: 重新开始，继续（某项活动）

example.ex: At that stage he will be 52, young enough to return to politics if he wishes to do so.
example.tran: 那时他将会是52岁，还很年轻，如果他希望的话，仍可重返政坛。

entry.def: When a judge or jury returns a verdict, they announce whether they think the person on trial is guilty or not.

example.ex: They returned a verdict of not guilty.
example.tran: 他们宣布了无罪的判决。

entry.def: A return ticket is a ticket for a journey from one place to another and then back again.

example.ex: He bought a return ticket and boarded the next train for home.
example.tran: 他买了往返票，并登上了下一趟回家的火车。

entry.def: The return trip or journey is the part of a journey that takes you back to where you started from.

example.ex: Buy an extra ticket for the return trip.
example.tran: 多买一张返程票。

entry.def: The return on an investment is the profit that you get from it.

example.ex: Profits have picked up this year but the return on capital remains tiny...
example.tran: 今年的利润已经回升，但是资本收益仍然很少。

example.ex: Higher returns and higher risk usually go hand in hand.
example.tran: 更高的收益通常伴随着更高的风险。

entry.def: A tax return is an official form that you fill in with details about your income and personal situation, so that the income tax you owe can be calculated.

example.ex: He was convicted of filing false income tax returns...
example.tran: 他因为在纳税申报表上作假而被定罪。

example.ex: Anyone with slight complications in their tax affairs is likely to be asked to fill in a return.
example.tran: 任何在税务方面情况稍微复杂的人都可能要填写税收申报表。

entry.def: Returns are the results of votes after an election.

example.ex: Early returns show Bulgaria's opposition party may have won.
example.tran: 早期的选举结果表明保加利亚的反对党可能已获胜。

entry.def: When it is someone's birthday, people sometimes say 'Many happy returns' to them as a way of greeting them.
entry.tran: (生日祝词)生日快乐，长命百岁

entry.def: If you do something in return for what someone else has done for you, you do it because they did that thing for you.

example.ex: You pay regular premiums and in return the insurance company will pay out a lump sum.
example.tran: 你定期支付保险费，而保险公司则会一次性给你一笔钱作为回报。

example.ex: The deal offers an increase in policy value in return for giving up guarantees.
example.tran: 作为放弃担保的交换，这笔交易将提高保单价值。

entry.def: If you say that you have reached the point of no return, you mean that you now have to continue with what you are doing and it is too late to stop.
entry.tran: 不能回头的地步;无路可退

example.ex: The release of Mr Nelson Mandela marked the point of no return in South Africa's movement away from apartheid.
example.tran: 纳尔逊·曼德拉先生的释放标志着南非种族隔离政策一去不复返。

means.word_mean: 1. document giving the tax collector information about the taxpayer's tax liability;

sentences.sentence: "his gross income was enough that he had to file a tax return"

means.word_mean: 2. a coming to or returning home;

sentences.sentence: "on his return from Australia we gave him a welcoming party"

means.word_mean: 3. the occurrence of a change in direction back in the opposite direction

sentences.sentence: "upon the restitution of the book to its rightful owner the child was given a tongue lashing"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of returning to a prior location;

sentences.sentence: "they set out on their return to the base camp"

means.word_mean: 6. the income arising from land or other property;

sentences.sentence: "the average return was about 5%"
"the return of spring"

means.word_mean: 8. a quick reply to a question or remark (especially a witty or critical one);

sentences.sentence: "it brought a sharp rejoinder from the teacher"

means.word_mean: 9. the key on electric typewriters or computer keyboards that causes a carriage return and a line feed

sentences.sentence: "in return we gave them as good as we got"

means.word_mean: 11. a tennis stroke that returns the ball to the other player;

sentences.sentence: "he won the point on a cross-court return"

means.word_mean: 12. (American football) the act of running back the ball after a kickoff or punt or interception or fumble
13. the act of someone appearing again;

sentences.sentence: "his reappearance as Hamlet has been long awaited"

means.word_mean: 1. come back to place where one has been before, or return to a previous activity

sentences.sentence: "render money"

means.word_mean: 3. go back to a previous state;

sentences.sentence: "We reverted to the old rules"
"This harks back to a previous remark of his"

means.word_mean: 5. bring back to the point of departure

sentences.sentence: "return a compliment"
"return her love"
"return a kickback"
"Her old vigor returned"
"Please refund me my money"
"render a verdict"
"deliver a judgment"
"The estate fell to my sister"
"The land returned to the family"
"The estate devolved to an heir that everybody had assumed to be dead"

means.word_mean: 14. return to a previous position; in mathematics;

sentences.sentence: "The point returned to the interior of the figure"
"The cow brings in 5 liters of milk"
"This year's crop yielded 1,000 bushels of corn"
"The estate renders some revenue for the family"

means.word_mean: 16. submit (a report, etc.) to someone in authority;

sentences.sentence: "submit a bill to a legislative body"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: the verb from Old French returner, from Latin re- 'back' + tornare 'to turn'; the noun via Anglo-Norman French

sentences.cn: 我等他回来等了很长时间。
sentences.en: I waited a long time for him to return.

sentences.cn: 她在欧洲逗留了六个月，明天要返回澳大利亚了。
sentences.en: She's returning to Australia tomorrow after six months in Europe.

sentences.cn: 我下班回来，发现屋里空无一人。
sentences.en: I returned from work to find the house empty.

sentences.cn: 她是什么时候旅行回来的？
sentences.en: When did she return home from the trip?

sentences.cn: 我们不得不将吹风机退回商店，因为它有残损。
sentences.en: We had to return the hairdryer to the store because it was faulty.

sentences.cn: 我得把一些书还给图书馆。
sentences.en: I must return some books to the library.

sentences.cn: 今晚布莱尔将返回伦敦。
sentences.en: Blair will return to London tonight...

sentences.cn: 我们的通讯记者斯蒂芬·萨克刚从边境的营地回来。
sentences.en: Our correspondent Stephen Sackur has just returned from the camps on the border...

sentences.cn: 赖尔解释了他突然返回伦敦的原因。
sentences.en: Ryle explained the reason for his sudden return to London.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢这本书，并且在还书时也这样说了。
sentences.en: I enjoyed the book and said so when I returned it...

sentences.cn: 这辆车没有按时归还，然后就报失了。
sentences.en: The car was not returned on time, then was reported stolen.

sentences.cn: 他把笔记本放回到他的夹克里。
sentences.en: He returned the notebook to his jacket.

sentences.cn: 探长回到警察局后回了电话。
sentences.en: Back at the station the Chief Inspector returned the call...

sentences.cn: 如果她的感情得不到回报，她会感到非常失望。
sentences.en: She will be disappointed if her feelings are not returned.

sentences.cn: 阿尔及利亚的官方报告表明这个国家正在恢复往日的平静。
sentences.en: Official reports in Algeria suggest that calm is returning to the country...

sentences.cn: 疼痛又如潮水般阵阵袭来。
sentences.en: The pain returned in waves.

sentences.cn: 生活已经改善并恢复了正常。
sentences.en: Life has improved and returned to normal.

sentences.cn: 所有这些作家都回归到了教会权力这个主题上。
sentences.en: The power of the Church is one theme all these writers return to.

sentences.cn: 那时他将会是52岁，还很年轻，如果他希望的话，仍可重返政坛。
sentences.en: At that stage he will be 52, young enough to return to politics if he wishes to do so.

sentences.cn: 他们宣布了无罪的判决。
sentences.en: They returned a verdict of not guilty.

sentences.cn: 他买了往返票，并登上了下一趟回家的火车。
sentences.en: He bought a return ticket and boarded the next train for home.

sentences.cn: 多买一张返程票。
sentences.en: Buy an extra ticket for the return trip.

sentences.cn: 今年的利润已经回升，但是资本收益仍然很少。
sentences.en: Profits have picked up this year but the return on capital remains tiny...

sentences.cn: 更高的收益通常伴随着更高的风险。
sentences.en: Higher returns and higher risk usually go hand in hand.

sentences.cn: 他因为在纳税申报表上作假而被定罪。
sentences.en: He was convicted of filing false income tax returns...

sentences.en: Anyone with slight complications in their tax affairs is likely to be asked to fill in a return.

sentences.en: Early returns show Bulgaria's opposition party may have won.

sentences.en: You pay regular premiums and in return the insurance company will pay out a lump sum.

sentences.en: The deal offers an increase in policy value in return for giving up guarantees.

sentences.en: The release of Mr Nelson Mandela marked the point of no return in South Africa's movement away from apartheid.

sentences.en: He was met by his brother on his return from Italy.

sentences.cn: 我们的通讯记者斯蒂芬·萨克刚从边境的营地回来。

sentences.en: Yet two years before Dickens's birth, his mother's father was caught stealing and fled to Europe, never to return.

sentences.en: About a quarter of all Italian immigrants, for example, eventually returned to Italy for good.

sentences.cn: 一次，在我刚在维也纳待了一年回来时，我被邀请在一场奥运会级别的马术比赛中给一位德国裁判翻译。

sentences.en: This remains true and we have by now a good deal of experience in the matter.

sentences.en: Mr. Nishio has just returned and he would like to see you.

sentences.en: I do not believe the Sith could have returned without us knowing.

sentences.cn: 他在一个雨夜突然回来了.

sentences.cn: 她是在傍晚时分回来的.

sentences.cn: 我会回来协助的! 你先在这里拖住他.
sentences.en: Credo: I will return with help! You stall him until then!

sentences.en: When she returned a newcomer was in the Vance flat.

sentences.cn: 他接着说他们一周后回来.
sentences.en: He added that they return a week later.

sentences.cn: 生菜吃起来也很味美,一小会儿之后他吃完回来.
sentences.en: The lettuce tasted just as good and he returned a while later completely full.

sentences.cn: 幸亏她晚饭回来吃的,并且吃了两碗.
sentences.en: Fortunately, she returned to eat dinner and even had two bowls of rice.

sentences.cn: 我把手表忘在桌上了; 可当我回来找时,什么都没有了.
sentences.en: I left my watch on the table, but when I returned I could find neither hide nor hair.

sentences.cn: 她向上帝祷告,保佑她丈夫平安回来.
sentences.en: She offered a prayer to God for her husband's safe return.

sentences.cn: 他拿拿这个,放放那个, 希望她就在邻近什么地方,立即会回来的.
sentences.en: He trifled about, hoping that she was somewhere in the neighborhood and would soon return.

sentences.cn: 我刚刚旅行回来,现在才收到你的银行电汇.
sentences.en: I have just returned from my travels and have now received your bank wire transfer.

sentences.cn: 幸存者调整自身以适应新的环境, 阳光会回来, 谷物和农场会有好收成.
sentences.en: Survivors adjust to their new conditions, sunlight returns, crops and gardens begin to produce abundantly.

sentences.cn: 他亲自为前线回来的将士斟酒.

sentences.cn: 她将经上海回来.

sentences.cn: 我们从另一条路回来的.

sentences.en: The peace that returned in August 1945 was the prelude to profound changes.

sentences.en: The goal of the editors was to return justice to all gods and mortals.

sentences.cn: 它于1904 、 1908和1920年重现奥运会体坛,但此后又销声匿迹了一段时间, 直到1972年才得到恢复.

sentences.en: An evil gargoyle, once thought dead and banished forever, has returned with a vengeance.

sentences.en: And then, some day, although this is seldom done, you really ought to return it.

sentences.en: The Tories, the likely winners, want to return bank supervision to the Bank of England.

sentences.cn: 自行车可以借给他,条件是明天必须归还.
sentences.en: He can use the bicycle on condition ( that ) he returns it tomorrow.

sentences.en: The thief forced to return what he had stolen to the owner.

sentences.cn: 我的车子可以借给你,条件是明天必须归还.
sentences.en: You can use my car on condition that you return it tomorrow.

sentences.en: The stamp in the library book shows it must be returned tomorrow.

sentences.en: Whereas parties concerned refuse to return, the case shall be regarded as illegal occupation of land.

sentences.cn: 我们的施工者归还了建筑师计划的草案, 他们要求更好的 防 通风(设计).
sentences.en: Our builder has returned the first draft of the architect's plan, asking for better draught - proofing .

sentences.cn: 项目必须归还在新的条件下原包装盒.
sentences.en: Item must be returned in the original box with new condition.

sentences.cn: 他们通常在一个月内归还手稿.
sentences.en: They usually return the manuscript inside of a month.

sentences.en: Official reports in Algeria suggest that calm is returning to the country...

sentences.cn: 生活已经改善并恢复了正常。
sentences.en: Life has improved and returned to normal.

sentences.cn: 为了限制莫纳克亚山上望远镜的数量,之前建立的望远镜在其使用寿命结束后将会被移除,它们的建造地也会被恢复成自然状态。
sentences.en: To limit the number of telescopes on Mauna Kea, old ones will be removed at the end of their lifetimes and their sites returned to a natural state.

sentences.cn: 甚至连全球报纸业中处境最艰难的美国报纸业也挺了过来，并且基本恢复盈利。
sentences.en: Even American newspapers, which inhabit the most troubled corner of the global industry, have not only survived but often returned to profit.

sentences.cn: 随着美国银行在美国政府和纳税人的帮助下恢复元气，总统奥巴马与银行的最高管理层进行了会谈，告诉他们该是回报的时候了。
sentences.en: As U.S. banks recovered with the help of the American government and the American taxpayer, president Obama held meetings with top bank executives, telling them it’s time to return the favor.
